nodes.text: Klev was an assistant of Squarn's who worked in Squarn's Junkyard on the planet Muugrah.

When a group of Rebels arrived to get parts to repair the hyperdrive of their ship, the Transorb, they were met by Klev who led them to a permanently emplaced military surplus shelter module which served as the junk seller's office. Once there, he introduced them to Squarn.
